mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.serial AS serial,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.type_id AS typeId,A.type_code AS typeCode,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.dict_code AS dictCode,A.forum_id AS forumId,A.title AS title,A.sub_title AS subTitle,A.description AS description,A.content AS content,A.pic_paths AS picPaths,A.praise_num AS praiseNum,A.author_id AS authorId,A.user_id AS userId,A.user_ids AS userIds,A.visit_num AS visitNum,A.is_essence AS isEssence,A.is_top AS isTop,A.is_hot AS isHot,A.is_recommend AS isRecommend,A.link_type AS linkType,A.link_id AS linkId,A.owner_id AS ownerId,A.owner_ids AS ownerIds,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy
,f.name AS forumName ,s.id AS shopId ,s.name AS shopName ,s.logo AS shopLogo ,fac.id AS overCollect ,u.username as username ,u.avatar AS userAvatar ,u.serial AS userSerial
LEFT JOIN forum f ON f.id = A.forum_id LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = A.user_id LEFT JOIN shop s ON s.user_id = A.user_id LEFT JOIN forum_article_collect fac ON A.id = fac.article_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
